articles.title: From Pranali Rathod to Shivangi Joshi; here’s how much the actresses in Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai earn - The Times of India
articles.description: Hina Khan, Shivangi Joshi, Pranali Rathod, and Samridhii Shukla starred in "Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai." Curious about their earnings? Here's a glimpse into how much they were compensated for their roles in the popular TV show.
